<h1 align="center">
  A barebone Gatsby starter
</h1>

This is a barebone skeleton starter to build a Gatsby website.

## Before Coding...

Before you can start to code please add:

```
npm i react react-dom gatsby
npm i -D prettier cross-env
```

## Theming

Added theme:

```js
const Layout = ({ children }) => (
  <>
    <ThemeProvider theme={theme}>
      <Global styles={global(theme)} />
      <div css={(theme) => ({ color: theme.colors.primary })}>
        some other text
      </div>
      {children}
    </ThemeProvider>
  </>
);
```
